meanings.definition: An inactive precursor of an enzyme.
meanings.sent1: The proenzymes in the cell will become active enzymes when needed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how proenzymes transform into active enzymes.
meanings.sent3: The proenzymes were like sleeping enzymes, waiting to wake up and start working.
meanings.sent4: Her potential was hidden like proenzymes waiting to be activated.
meanings.sent5: The proenzymes sat quietly, ready to turn into powerful enzymes at any moment.

meanings.definition: A substance that is converted into an enzyme.
meanings.sent1: The body produces proenzymes that can be changed into enzymes for digestion.
meanings.sent2: Proenzymes are essential for the process of enzyme production in the body.
meanings.sent3: The proenzymes were like ingredients waiting to be mixed into the enzyme recipe.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were the proenzymes that would eventually turn into successful projects.
meanings.sent5: The proenzymes were the building blocks for the powerful enzymes to come.
